overview: The conservative and eternal worrier, Thomas, picks up his adventurous boyfriend from the airport. Axel works as a steward and has seen the whole world. But now, he’s sitting in a car next to Thomas, about to make a demand. Axel wants a threesome – with Thomas and a Boeing 737. What Thomas mistakes as a joke turns out to be an existential threat to their relationship. An emotionally-driven debate leads to turmoil. The small private room of their parked car is the stage on which Thomas and Axel have to negotiate their expectations on a shared future.
title: Love is in the Air
